mapper.select: SELECT T.TRAVEL_NO, T.TRAVEL_TITLE, T.PRIVATE_FL, TO_CHAR(T.TRAVEL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') TRAVEL_DATE, (SELECT PS.FIRST_IMAGE FROM "PLACE_SCRAP" PS WHERE PS.CONTENT_ID = (SELECT TL.CONTENT_ID FROM "TRAVEL_LIST" TL WHERE TRAVEL_LIST_ORDER = 0 AND TL.TRAVEL_NO = T.TRAVEL_NO)) FIRST_IMAGE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TRAVEL_LIST" TL WHERE TL.TRAVEL_NO = T.TRAVEL_NO) TRAVEL_PLACE_COUNT, (SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = T.MEMBER_NO) MEMBER_NICKNAME, (SELECT PROFILE_IMAGE FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = T.MEMBER_NO) PROFILE_IMAGE FROM TRAVEL T WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND T.TRAVEL_DEL_FL = 'N'
